text: Vasil Fyodaravich Yakusha (, 30 June 1958 – 24 November 2020) was a Belarusian rower. He competed for the Soviet Union where he won a silver medal in the 1980 Summer Olympics and a bronze medal in the 1988 Summer Olympics. He was born in Kyiv, Ukraine. Yakusha died on 24 November 2020 at the age of 62.На 63-м году жизни ушел из жизни Василий Фёдорович Якуша ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belarusian sportspeople Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Sportspeople from Kyiv
title: Vasil Yakusha
